      public abstract boolean allocateBwForContainerVm(ContainerVm containerVm, long bw)
      Allocates BW for a given VM.
      Parameters:
      containerVm - virtual machine for which the bw are being allocated
      bw - the bw
      Returns:
      $true if the bw could be allocated; $false otherwise
      Precondition:
      $none
      Postcondition:
      $none
